text: Empress Dou may refer to 3 Han dynasty empresses, who all reigned as empresses dowager: *Empress Dou (Wen) (died 135 BC), wife of Emperor Wen of Han and mother of Emperor Jing of Han *Empress Dou (Zhang) (died 97), wife of Emperor of Zhang of Han *Empress Dou Miao (died 172), third wife of Emperor Huan of Han Dou Dou
title: Empress Dou
